channel.title: Volume 01 - Interregnum on The Thousand Kingdoms
channel.description: Recent content in Volume 01 - Interregnum on The Thousand Kingdoms

item.title: 01.013 Sparring
item.description: Now you see the true power of Ellaâ€™s very mild enhanced healing.

item.title: 01.012 Halloween
item.description: A bit more training montage, but I wanted to bring back in some magic and even a sense of wonder.

item.title: 01.011 Breathe
item.description: I was going for that calm before the storm vibe here, she is mentally getting her head into the game a bit.

item.title: 01.010 Prep
item.description: Dealing with one’s parents is often something that is brushed over in fantasy.

item.title: 01.009 Exposition
item.description: Who knew that dwarves were trolls?

item.title: 01.008 Interlude Kennington
item.description: This chapter I am always going to say was super hard.

item.title: 01.007 Again
item.description: This chapter was more difficult to write than the others - lots of establishing new characters and trying to imply familial relationships but with a hopefully light touch.

item.title: 01.006 Acceptance
item.description: This was all Ella needing to feel real, and I did not expect it when I wrote it.

item.title: 01.005 The Date
item.description: After the disappointment Ella experienced in her last chapter, I felt like I needed to kickstart the story with more evidence and someone else who maybe knows a little bit more than her.

item.title: 01.004 You Can't Go Back
item.description: Ella is very good at denial but the cracks are showing.

item.title: 01.003 The Party
item.description: I encourage you to channel some Sailor Moon magical girl sequencing here.

item.title: 01.002 One Month Later
item.description: Yes it is a bit of a skip ahead, but often I find that the pacing of stories feels unrealistic.

item.title: 01.001 Vision
item.description: Welcome When I started this story, I had a couple goals in mind.
